content.webTitle: Injured Giggs is doubt for final

fields.headline: Injured Giggs is doubt for final
fields.bodyText: Ryan Giggs and Wes Brown, who have thigh strains, are doubtful for Sunday's Worthington Cup final against Liverpool. But Paul Scholes appears to have overcome a groin injury. Giggs said yesterday he was staying put, despite interest from Internazionale. "The only time I thought about playing abroad was when I was younger," he said. "At that time Serie A was the top league, but once I became successful with United I wanted it to carry on. I am happy here and have over three years left on my contract. I want to end the best playing days of my career at United. The way I see it, that is what is going to happen."
